item.title: Temp repair useless, 17th October
item.description:
Pot hole in the usual place on Lobleys Bridge heading from Coopers Edge to Abbeymead. A temp fix was done a week ago which was a waste of money and time. The edge on the pot hole is sharp and could easily damage a tyre. I am fed up reporting this, please fix it properly.and more to the point, permanently.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Three potholes within a few feet of each other., 17th October
item.description:
Just after entering the village in Brockhampton Lane, near the 30 mile speed limit signs coming from the GE aviation side. This problem has been reported a few times & we were told it’s been fixed. It most certainly hasn’t. Nothing has been done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Tewkesbury

item.title: Piles of hedge cuttings left on pavement, 17th October
item.description:
There have been piles of hedge cuttings left on the pavement all week. I reported it on Monday. The case was subsequently closed, but as the attached pic shows (taken at 1pm today) the issue persists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Paragon Terrace, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.description:

item.title: The bend is increasingly covered with water, 17th October
item.description:
The first left hand bend, coming from Cheltenham, in Cold Pool Lane, between Bluebell Farm and Halfpenny Farm. The corner is partially flooded causing cars to go onto the wrong side of the road. This corner is already an accident hot-spot, without the added water hazard and will be potentially be lethal in icy weather.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cold Pool Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The dropped curb is lifting and the pavement needs filling in, 17th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Christchurch Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
